title: Executioner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, after your target is hanged, you can Torment one player who voted guilty or abstained, dealing an Unstoppable Attack to them. Only usable once per game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you will receive a non-Power Town member as your target.
- If your target dies without being hanged, a random new non-Power Town member becomes your target.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See your target hanged during the day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4439
*He wasn't insane or vicious as the nobility thought he was - he was simply doing a dirty job.*
